medical_history.chief_complaint: Generalized abdominal pain with associated nausea/vomiting and subjective fevers.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient felt gassy and unwell 4 days ago. Pain started yesterday morning, described as vague and diffuse, with nausea and emesis x2. Subjective fevers noted this morning. Last bowel movement was normal this AM.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Benign pancreatic cyst, Lap Cholecystectomy, Open Distal Pancreatectomy & splenectomy for pancreatic cysts.
